mapper.select: select ifnull(max(bus_number_start+busnum_end-busnum_start),0) from BMS_OR_FACTORY_ORDER where bus_number_start=( select max(od.bus_number_start) from BMS_OR_FACTORY_ORDER od left join BMS_OR_ORDER o on od.order_id=o.id where o.productive_year = #{productive_year} and o.order_type='标准订单')
mapper.update: delete from BMS_OR_FACTORY_ORDER where order_id=#{order_id} and production_qty='0'
mapper.select: select max(order_no) from BMS_OR_ORDER where order_no like concat('%',#{year},'%')
